entry.title: Magic Animation Blend
entry.content:
A new way to blend animations in Unity.

WebGL Demo â€¢ Documentation â€¢ Demo Scene â€¢ Video Tutorial


THIS TOOL IS COMPATIBLE WITH UNITY 6.


ğŸ’¡ Break free from limitations!


Animator is great, but it is very limited when adding new content to your awesome game! Magic Blending sets you free from spaghetti animators by providing a smooth and modular way to blend animations in your game.


â” How can I use it in my game?


Imagine you have a nice Animator Controller and need to add new weapons or items. With Magic Blending, you don't need to create new animations or modify your Animator Controller at all - just create a Magic Blend Asset and adjust the sliders!


Moreover, this plugin uses unique procedural blending, ensuring the final result is smooth and natural.


ğŸŒŸ Sounds interesting? Here are some more details about Magic Blending


âœ”ï¸ One animation, different poses

Forget about spaghetti animator controllers. Pick a weapon, item or stance pose you like and the plugin will procedurally animate it.


âœ”ï¸ Next-gen blending

Dynamic additive blending ensures automated and smooth transitions between poses. Forget about setting up transitions for each state in the Animator!


âœ”ï¸ It is incredibly simple

Very fast setup and no need for code knowledge. Perfect for artists and beginners!


âœ”ï¸ Works with Animation States

Bind Magic Blends to the States, and the system will perfectly sync it with your animator controller.


âœ”ï¸ Compatible with third-party plugins

Magic Blending enhances the animator controller, which means you can use it with any other package (e.g. Animation Riging).


âœ”ï¸ Simple customization

Just tweak the sliders in runtime to control the blending. No need to restart the game.


âœ¨Try the procedural animation magic and see the difference!

entry.content:
Synty ANIMATION is here! Compatible with Synty POLYGON and Simple characters. This pack contains 247 hand crafted animations and a demo character controller crafted with Synty's trademark quality.

SyntyÂ® Studios presents: ANIMATION - Base Locomotion

Elevate your game to new heights with the dynamic motion of Synty's Animation - Base Locomotion.


â—¼ Key Features â—¼

  • 247 Animation clips as separate files allow you to to only import the animations you need into your project
  • Character controller example scripts
  • Mecanim animation controllers - Masculine and Feminine
  • Demo scene to test the animations
  • Gallery scene with all the animations laid out
  • Crash dummy character - fully rigged and animated
  • All animations FBX files are included so you can use them outside of Unity

Bring your characters life with fluid movement and seamless transitions. Say goodbye to the hassle of sourcing animations from all over the internet and constructing your controller from scratch â€“ our comprehensive pack equips you with everything you need to bring your characters to life in no time.


This powerhouse pack is brimming with essential animations for every common character motion need â€“ from leisurely walks to adrenaline-pumping sprints, graceful jumps to heart-racing slides. With each state meticulously crafted, complete with multiple animations and smooth transitions, your characters will move with unparalleled grace.


But wait, there's more! We've gone the extra mile by providing animations for both masculine and feminine figures, ensuring that your game's characters exude authenticity and diversity. With the ability to seamlessly blend between the two, the possibilities for character expression and personality are limitless.


Dive deep into the Mecanim Animation Controllers included in this pack and unlock a treasure trove of knowledge on setting up animation states, transitions, blend trees, and parameters. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a budding developer, these resources provide the perfect launchpad for crafting your own unique animation controller.


Don't just make games â€“ make them come alive with Synty's Animation - Base Locomotion. Your players won't just play; they'll be transported into a world where every step, jump, and slide feels like magic.


Crash dummy model and animation controller demo scene included!
